com.sitewhere.spi.device.communication

Interface IDeviceCommunication

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ILifecycleComponent, ITenantLifecycleComponent

    public interface IDeviceCommunication
extends ITenantLifecycleComponent
    Base interface for system components that empower device communication.
